html:
12.29.23  9:05 pm   What are those?

Does the above question give you nostalgia?

      no

12.29.23  9:02 pm   is jumping a crime?

      in most cases no

12.29.23  8:31 pm   i have this thing where i get really scared/nervous to do a specific task, even though that task isnt very difficult. any tips on how i get over this?

      do it many more times

12.29.23  8:27 pm   There's this thing i do where whenever im not completely happy with something ive done I kind of squint my eyes so it looks a bit different. It's kind of like my brain is trying to trick me into thinking that's not it, but the downside is that it does not give me insight into how to make it better. I have noticed now that it is very similar to what I would do when producing music and I would just add reverb to make it feel "full" or "better" and kind of ignore the fact that my sound selection and/or voicings and/or arrangement are not great to begin with. And now that I have seen this in 2 different worlds (visual and audio) I can't help but wonder all the other ways my brain has done that same process throughout life for me. Have you noticed something similar in your case?

     i don't think so

     Mind sharing it?

12.29.23  8:25 pm   Do you have a favorite sweater 

      i don't have any sweaters

12.29.23  7:54 pm   im starting the cosplay. thank you. 

      don't thank me, i don't even really know what that is

12.29.23  7:50 pm   what's your new years theme?

      1/1/[lastyear+1]

12.29.23  7:11 pm   The notion of music as a language seems to be literally true for you (as I imagine it is for most musicians at your skill level).

     it deals with feelings much more than other languages do, and less with facts and statements

     That being said, what could someone be trying to get across using the chord progression Am F C G?

     you'll have to listen to it and see what you feel

      Or is there no way to know what someone means by their music through chords alone?

     if you hear it, then you'll feel it

12.29.23  6:23 pm   What if perfect wasn't perfect?

      perfect isn't anything. indeed perfect is perfect, but those aren't anything

12.29.23  6:18 pm   what are some things you like to do when you feel overwhelmed?

      it's different every time. the most recent time, what seemed to save me was the word "try"

12.29.23  5:50 pm   Thots on spelling "beauty" as "buty"?

      looks like butty. of or relating to butts

12.29.23  5:37 pm   Do you think that a prescription of a month by the sea would cure your ailments?

      no

12.29.23  4:36 pm   i feel like you're good at jeopardy

      i probably am not. unless the answer is paradiddle or something

12.29.23  3:56 pm   How do you figure out what you want? I've noticed you usually answer "motivation" questions with "motivation to do what?". I think it's a really interesting point and I've been pondering it a lot. But how do you figure out the "what"?

     pretty much just wander around until you get that "wow" feeling somehow. then follow that closer and closer

     By the way, your videos are part of my daily routine. Thank you so much for sharing your existence with the world!

P.s., how is it going with your journey to becoming an expert interviewee?

     the true expert is usually the one hosting the show

12.29.23  2:58 pm   why am i weird

      this will surely help you on your quest

12.29.23  2:53 pm   What is your motivation in life?

      it's hard to describe. but i know a lot of things are possible. more things than have ever been done before. that seems to be the general theme of this place

12.29.23  1:03 pm   smash or pass: potatoes

      ......mash

12.29.23  12:54 pm   what is your favorite IPA symbol

      ə

12.29.23  10:29 am   What would you do to address inflation?

      maybe i'll just become president and then bring the prices down

12.29.23  10:23 am   do you write your songs with a general theme in mind or are they just how you feel at the time

      it's how i feel, even if i'm unaware of what that is

12.29.23  10:19 am   I'm a middle schooler, and I have been trying to write books in google docs and stuff, but I also have aspirations to form a rock band when I get to high school, and also want to work on my art skills and feel completely confused on what I want to do. And I just wanted to know which option could work the best. 

      any one of those things could be best, or, as is so often the case, some other option that combines those skills might be best

12.29.23  8:13 am   can you show me your wheel house

      no. all i can do is tell you whether or not something is in it

12.29.23  7:50 am   how to improve my vision

      you can use that spoon tapping trick that the guy does in that fake ad (and also the same trick for the ears in the ear ad). unless they made false advertising legal of course, in which case it might be a lie

12.29.23  6:38 am   have you ever been on a tram?

      i was going to say no but now that i think about it yes

12.29.23  6:24 am   how much do you love the moon

      very much, although i probably take it for granted at this point

12.29.23  5:42 am   When you create, it is with the intent that all parts of it (instrumental, lyrics, visuals, etc.) work together in a symposium which leads to a innately unique experience. Unless that is wrong, in which case you should correct me, would you say this is something that you always knew was the case or a revelation you have made along the way? 

      seems like common sense to me, not so much a revelation. what i sometimes find surprising, however, is when other people find that surprising

12.29.23  5:42 am   Do 'favorite' questions annoy you?

     only insofar as they seem completely unanswerable to me. on one hand i welcome the challenge, but on the other hand, i also usually find that i've already answered the question in every possible way. then again, i also welcome that challenge

     Do you have a favorite favorite question?

     no

     And if so, what is it?

12.29.23  4:41 am   Do you plan on doing 2d stuff still or are from now on only gonna 3d stuff?

      both, and maybe more

12.29.23  3:46 am   what does time passing by feel like?

      absolutely normal, and yet totally impossible and illogical

12.29.23  3:44 am   Do you ever get jealous?

      i don't recall

12.29.23  3:33 am   how do you make your videos so lively?

      it helps to be scared of death

12.29.23  2:48 am   do you like spinning

      maybe just once

12.29.23  2:17 am   do you find metronomes (with no music, just the ticking) calming or do they stress you out (or some other emotion)?

      i think that would be mildly unsettling

12.29.23  2:14 am   do you think grass grows individually or as a group

      i assume it stays in exactly the same spot, while the rest of the world moves down a little

12.29.23  1:38 am   Why do I so often find myself saying "when I'm an adult" when I've already been an adult for several years now

     maybe you're just too old to change your ways

12.29.23  1:34 am   is it a good idea for me to start a cosplay 

      it could be

12.29.23  12:55 am   have you reached the point of being "older" that you talk about in When I Get Older, where you are stronger and can lift up the whole entire world? or to the point where you are wilder and write poetry in your spare time? or to the point where you drive slowly and reach all the places you're going? or have you gotten younger and become a liar? 

      maybe i had already reached all those points when i wrote the song. maybe it was from a retrospective point of view

12.29.23  12:51 am   do you ever watch a show or episode of a show that you're already familiar with dubbed in another language to help you learn it

      yes

12.29.23  12:48 am   how many of the last 24 hours did you spend on improving your Dutch comprehension

      none

12.29.23  12:43 am   do you think creativity, or rather coming up with new, interesting artistic ideas, is something that just happens luckily by circumstance on some lucky days and times,

     yes

     or is something we can conduce in ourselves?

     maybe sometimes

12.28.23  11:21 pm   What are your New Year's resolutions?

      would seem fake, if i made them. new years resolutions strike me as more of a december/january conversation piece than an actual commitment to anything

12.28.23  10:13 pm   how can you make your life different every day?

      build something complex that takes many days to build

12.28.23  10:10 pm   i have a hard time texting people and asking if they want to do stuff like hang out

      that makes sense. hanging out is awkward

12.28.23  9:44 pm   are you an alien 

      no

12.28.23  9:37 pm   If the universe is deterministic, and past states determine future states, do we just perceive time linearly while actually everything - past/present/future - is eternally fixed, like frames in a movie reel?

      in my opinion, in the hypothetical situation you described, no one would perceive anything. it's my opinion that the existence of consciousness is a direct result of non-determinism. it's like when you see a bus driver: that tells you that the bus has a steering wheel, and can indeed go in multiple directions

12.28.23  8:59 pm   are u excited for the new year? (pls express your answer in just emojis/not words if possible :p)

      i'm excited for the future regardless of the calendar boundaries. i'm also excited for the calendar in general. and i prefer not to use emojis because they are not reliably consistent across different devices

12.28.23  8:52 pm   are you a picky eater

      choosy, not picky

12.28.23  8:47 pm   have you studied music,

     sure

     if so for how long

     just about whenever i hear music, i'm absorbing its effects

12.28.23  7:45 pm   How did you learn to sing 

      by singing

12.28.23  7:44 pm   hey bill how do you feel about the people trying to replicate your style?

      sometimes it feels like i'm the only one trying not to
